input: I'm guessing this happens because, while many gay people do agree with fluidity of sexuality, we are also often told we just need to 'find the right person' etc and it causes them to get defensive. I know that you are right, but I still get upset if someone tells me I just need to find the right man because the intention is usually to dismiss my sexuality, while your intention was just to share information.
